original_title: Billy Joe Shaver: Live at Billy Bob's Texas
overview: Country songwriting icon and honky tonk hero, Billy Joe Shaver and his Heart of Texas Band offer the best from his catalog of legendary songs in concert from the stage of the world’s largest honky tonk. Shaver’s Live at Billy Bob’s Texas concert film released July 17, 2012 and was his first album in five years.
title: Billy Joe Shaver: Live at Billy Bob's Texas
